protocol.text: Raw data (CEL files) obtained from RNA hybridisation experiments were analyzed using software Robin ( Lohse et al., 2010),and online tool PageMan was used for over representation analysis ID_REF =  VALUE = MAS5.0 signal intensity ABS_CALL =  DETECTION P-VALUE =
Seeds were sowed and grown in soil for three weeks under a 16-h-light (120-150 μE)/8-h-dark (22°C/18°C) regime before samples harvest.
Total RNA was isolated using the RNeasy plant mini kit (Qiagen)

Labelling, hybridisation, washing, staining, and scanning procedures were performed by an Affymetrix authorized service provider (ATLAS Biolabs, Berlin, Germany) as described in the Affymetrix technical manual
